items.title: Amex sees spending growth accelerate as it projects upbeat sales this year
items.description: Amex is also boosting its dividend by 17%.

items.title: Foreigners are chasing U.S. stocks. Historically, that’s a bad sign.
items.description: Foreigners have a tendency to buy U.S. stocks right before crashes.

items.title: Verizon’s stock rises after biggest gain in five years on key subscriber metric
items.description: The company added 568,000 postpaid phone subscribers in the fourth quarter.

items.title: Will Trump’s tough stance on remote work drag everyone else back to the office? Don’t bet on it.
items.description: In his first day back on the job, President Donald Trump officially joined a fight that some bosses are picking to end remote work and get their staff...

items.title: I’m 67, childless, and have $4.3 million. Do I have enough to start giving money away to my nieces and nephews?
items.description: Your definition of “enough” is what matters most, because you can’t take back gifts.
